content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5), transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5), and transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities (e.g. burner mining drill, burner inserter) have fuel to operate
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network
### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler have fuel to operate
### Errors when using stone furnace
- Ensure that the stone furnace has ingredients to process
### Errors when using electricity group
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
Important variables that have been assigned include:
* Entity positions (e.g. x=41.0, y=-82.0)
* Entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WORKING)
* Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace)
